#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int gcd(int a, int b)
{
    if(a>b)
        return gcd(b,a);
    if(b%a)
    {
        return gcd(b%a,a);
    }
    else
        return a;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,m;
        cin >> n >> m;
        int N,D;
        N = D = 1;
        for(int i = 1; i<n; ++i)
        {
            N = (N + D)%m;
            //D = D;

            //N = N;
            D = (D + N)%m;
        }
        //int x = gcd(N,D);
        //if(x == 1)
            cout << N << "/" << D << endl;
        //else
            //cout << N/x << "/" << D/x << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
